doc.title: Dear Food Network
doc.plot: Guy brings two of his biggest fans to Cabo San Lucas Mexico. He shows them the Mexican pride, culture, lifestyle and flavors he enjoys when on vacation. He'll expose his new friends to the old and the new Cabo cuisines. Also he includes the places only the local foodies know about. Plus, Aaron McCargo gives one of his fans a 'behind-the-scenes' tour of the Food Network.
